lead_paragraph: After the crucifixion of Jesus, an agnostic Roman Centurion is given the job of investigating rumors of a risen Messiah to stop unrest in Jerusalem, and finds that his doubts are challenged.
snippet: After the crucifixion of Jesus, an agnostic Roman Centurion is given the job of investigating rumors of a risen Messiah to stop unrest in Jerusalem, and finds that his doubts are challenged.
